and lower(${searchType}) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%'

select inboxSeq, fk_perno, receiver, subject, reDate, readState, p.name as fk_name from tbl_person P join ( select inboxSeq, fk_perno, receiver, subject, reDate, readState from ( select row_number() over (order by inboxSeq desc) as rno, inboxSeq, fk_perno, receiver, subject, to_char(reDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd PM HH:MI:SS') as reDate, readState from tbl_inbox where lower(${searchType}) like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%' )V where rno between to_number(#{startRno}) and to_number(#{endRno}) )I on P.perno = I.fk_perno where receiver = to_number(#{userid}) order by inboxSeq desc

select inboxSeq, fk_perno, receiver, subject, reDate, readState, p.name as fk_name from tbl_person P join ( select inboxSeq, fk_perno, receiver, subject, to_char(reDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd PM HH:MI:SS') as reDate, readState from tbl_inbox where inboxSeq = #{inboxSeq} )I on P.perno = I.fk_perno
mapper.update: update tbl_inbox set readState = 1 where inboxSeq = #{inboxSeq}
